User Story: As a user, I want to create a new world by describing it in my own words so I can quickly set up a custom narrative setting.
Acceptance Criteria:
The system accepts and processes a freeform text description of a fictional world
The system guides the user through a step-by-step world creation process
The user can enter basic world information including name, description, and genre
Form validation ensures required information is provided
Created worlds are saved to the system for future use

User Story: As a user, I want AI to suggest appropriate attributes and skills based on my world description so I don't have to design everything from scratch.
Acceptance Criteria:
The AI Service analyzes the provided world description
The system suggests appropriate attributes and skills based on the analysis
The user receives clear feedback during AI processing
AI suggestions include appropriate names and descriptions for attributes and skills
Suggestions are contextually relevant to the described world

User Story: As a user, I want to select a pre-defined template to quickly set up a world if I don't want to create my own.
Acceptance Criteria:
Pre-defined templates for Western, Sitcom, and Fantasy genres are available
Templates include complete sets of appropriate attributes and skills
Users can select and customize a template as an alternative to AI-assisted creation
Selected templates pre-populate all required world configuration fields
Template selections are clearly presented as options during world creation

User Story: As a user, I want to review and modify AI-suggested attributes for my world so I can customize them to my preferences.
Acceptance Criteria:
The UI displays AI-suggested attributes clearly
Users can approve, modify, or reject each suggested attribute
Modified attributes are immediately updated in the UI
Changes persist between wizard steps
The interface provides clear feedback on user actions

User Story: As a user, I want to define custom attributes for my world so characters can have appropriate traits.
Acceptance Criteria:
Users can add new custom attributes beyond AI suggestions
The system enforces the MVP limit of 6 total attributes
Each attribute requires a name and description
Duplicate attribute names are prevented through validation
Custom attributes are saved with the world configuration
